item.title: Strange hint parameter passed through
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

In Jagex’s RT2 engine, they use a class that implements ImageProducer and ImageObserver to store their buffer for drawing. There is an overridden method in there :

@Override public synchronized void addConsumer(ImageConsumer c) { consumer = c; c.setDimensions(width, height); c.setProperties(null); c.setColorModel(colorModel); c.setHints(14); }

What I want to know is where they got the “14” from. It isn’t a standard hint as far as I know.

EDIT: It might be “[font=helvetica]ImageConsumer.TOPDOWNLEFTRIGHT | ImageConsumer.COMPLETESCANLINES | ImageConsumer.SINGLEPASS”[/font]
